verbose_text: Since hypoxia related pathways play vital roles in the development and progression of ccRCC XREF_BIBR, to study whether there is a link between AHNAK2 and hypoxia pathway, we performed co-expression analysis in human ccRCC samples from Grumz Renal dataset and found that indeed there was a positive correlation between AHNAK2 expression and the expression of the target genes of hypoxia pathway.
